autoFocus.description: If set, the first input is focused when component is mounted, false by default
autoFocus.description_zh: 如果设置，则在挂载组件时聚焦第一个输入，默认为 false

disabled.description: If set, disabled attribute is added to all inputs
disabled.description_zh: 如果设置，则 disabled 属性将添加到所有输入

error.description: If set, adds error styles and aria-invalid attribute to all inputs
error.description_zh: 如果设置，则向所有输入添加错误样式和 aria-invalid 属性

gap.description: Key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value to set gap between inputs, numbers are converted to rem, 'md' by default
gap.description_zh: key，或者任何有效的 CSS 值来设置输入之间的间距，数字默认转换为 rem，'md'

getInputProps.description: Props added to the input element depending on its index
getInputProps.description_zh: 根据 input 元素的索引添加到 input 元素的 props

hiddenInputProps.description: Props passed down to the hidden input
hiddenInputProps.description_zh: 向下传递到隐藏输入的 props

id.description: Base id used for all inputs. By default, inputs' ids are generated randomly.
id.description_zh: 用于所有输入的基本 ID。默认情况下，输入的 ID 是随机生成的。

inputMode.type: search / text / none / tel / url / email / numeric / decimal
inputMode.description: inputmode attribute, inferred from the type prop if not specified
inputMode.description_zh: inputMode 属性，如果未指定，则从 type 属性推断

inputType.description: Inputs type attribute, inferred from the type prop if not specified
inputType.description_zh: Inputs type 属性，如果未指定，则从 type prop 推断

length.description_zh: 输入数量，默认为 4 个

manageFocus.description: Determines whether focus should be moved automatically to the next input once filled, true by default
manageFocus.description_zh: 确定填充后是否应将焦点自动移动到下一个输入，默认为 true

mask.description: Changes input type to "password", false by default
mask.description_zh: 将输入类型更改为 “password”，默认为 false

onComplete.description: Called when all inputs have value
onComplete.description_zh: 当所有输入都具有值时调用

oneTimeCode.description: Determines whether autocomplete="one-time-code" attribute should be set on all inputs, true by default
oneTimeCode.description_zh: 确定是否应在所有输入上设置 autocomplete=“one-time-code” 属性，默认为 true

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, numbers are converted to rem, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: key的 theme.radius 或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置 border-radius，数字默认转换为 rem，theme.defaultRadius

readOnly.description: If set, the user cannot edit the value
readOnly.description_zh: 如果设置，则用户无法编辑该值

rootRef.description: Assigns ref of the root element

size.description: Controls inputs width and height, 'sm' by default
size.description_zh: 控制输入的宽度和高度，默认为 'sm'

type.description: Determines which values can be entered, 'alphanumeric' by default
type.description_zh: 确定可以输入哪些值，默认为 'alphanumeric'
